caption: Fairfield Porter (1907-1975; born Winnetka, IL; died Southampton, NY; active New York, NY; Winnetka; and Southampton), Printed by Yann Samson at Resam Press, Published by Brooke Alexander Editions, Sunrise, 1974. Color lithograph on Arches paper; 76.2 x 55.9 cm (image), 89.4 x 62.9 cm (sheet). Gift of James Kraft, Class of 1957 (x1993-259)
